Class TitleScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class TitleScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
Main menu and first screen which is shown
